channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Grass and other Fauna, 30th June
item.description:
Grass and other fauna has not been cut allowing the overgrowth of vegetation on this roundabout causing obstruction to the safe observation of other traffic while negotiating this roundabout, i wish to add that several roundabouts on the A419 in Cirencester are also in dire need of maintenance also
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees blocking junction, 29th June
item.description:
The trees and bushes along Pirton lane heading towards Cordingley Close are overgrown. This means trying to exit Cordingley onto Pirton is extremely dangerous as you cannot see the oncoming traffic. There have been several near misses. The overgrown trees and bushes do not allow pedestrians to easily reach the bus stop which is also along this stretch of road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Pothole and high speed, 29th June
item.description:
There is a sewer cover in this area that gets deeper every day,it causing damage to cars.this street in general is in need of work on the pavement and every day it deteriorates more.About speed, I think they should make some speed bumps on this street because drivers abuse the speed limit.I can give the example that my old car was destroyed on my private park due to a driver who was speeding and couldn't stop his car.Me and all the neighbors in this area waitingfor resolving this matter as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole around manhole cover, 29th June
item.description:
Deep pothole around manhole cover that threatens life of any motorcycle rider who hit it as it is on a fast stretch of road, it would throw the rider off, repair required urgently

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Whittington, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 124, Springbank Road, Springbank, Cheltenham

item.title: Many potholes, road broken down, 28th June
item.description:
Potholes have been here for years, but getting far worse now. Mostly on west-bound carriageway, all across the road, large patch of broken road surface with many large potholes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: White lining around potholes needs renewal, 28th June
item.description:
Along Old Bath Road, on either side of Naunton Park Road, the white lining around the potholes, warning road users of their presence, is wearing out and needs renewal.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 119, Old Bath Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.description:

item.title: Enormous pothole, 27th June
item.description:
Large section of an enormous pothole, which is now quite deep and very dangerous. I have met somebody coming the wrong side of the road several times recently because they are trying to avoid this monstrosity. Fix it please before there’s an accident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 111, Charlton Lane, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes/ worn road, 27th June
item.description:
Very bad condition road along Malvern road by school and swimming baths. Potholes and badly worn surface. Awful to drive along even at low speed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malvern Road, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Evelyn Close (off Greatfield drive) invaded by wild bramble., 27th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-4, Evelyn Close, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: Brambles over pavement, Shakespeare Road near PE way, 26th June

item.title: Litter/tyres, 26th June
item.description:
If I had a £1 for every old tyre casing on the network as I travelled from Cribbs Causeway nr Bristol up to junction 36 of the M6 I'd be rich. There are loads! General rubbish in some areas also poor
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury
